headline: Show HN: Factor.fyi – use SQL to visualize financial, crypto and econ datasets
description:
Hey HN,

I'm Steve, co-founder of Factor.fyi, a new data platform for querying and visualizing financial datasets using SQL. During the pandemic, I took much more of an active role in managing my portfolio. I wanted to be able to make informed decisions about the investments I was making, and explore financial data in new ways. Market and Econ data are some of the most talked-about and widely-available datasets out there, but I was frustrated by the lack of options to answer questions I had, like, "What would have happened if I had started dollar-cost averaging VTI back in 2013?"[1] Or, "How many days did BTC and ETH move in the same direction as the S&P500?"[2]. We built Factor to answer these questions. You can use Factor to query disparate datasets in ways that are impossible on any other platform. We currently have 20 datasets [3] that you can use to answer questions you have about the markets and create beautiful visualizations around them. Factor is community-powered and free forever; you can browse our community-built charts here [4].

We'd love to get feedback from the HN community, hear your thoughts on what datasets we can add, and get advice on how we can make the querying experience even easier for those new to SQL.

[1]: https://factor.fyi/questions/dollar-cost-averaging-the-marke... [2]: https://factor.fyi/questions/s-p-btc-dia-correlation-factor-... [3]: https://factor.fyi/docs/dataset-reference [4]: https://factor.fyi/browse
headline_zh-Hans: Show HN: Factor.fyi - 使用SQL将金融、加密货币和经济数据集可视化
headline_zh-Hant: Show HN: Factor.fyi - 使用SQL將金融、加密貨幣和經濟數據集可視化
description_zh-Hans:
嘿，HN,

我是Steve，Factor.fyi的联合创始人，这是一个使用SQL查询和可视化金融数据集的新数据平台。在大流行期间，我在管理我的投资组合方面发挥了更大的积极作用。我希望能够对我正在进行的投资做出明智的决定，并以新的方式探索金融数据。市场和经济数据是一些最受关注和广泛使用的数据集，但我对缺乏选择来回答我的问题感到沮丧，比如，"如果我在2013年开始以美元成本平均化VTI，会发生什么？"[1] 或者，"BTC和ETH有多少天与S&P500同向移动？我们建立Factor来回答这些问题。你可以用Factor来查询不同的数据集，这在其他平台上是不可能的。我们目前有20个数据集[3]，你可以用来回答你关于市场的问题，并围绕它们创建漂亮的可视化。Factor is community-powered and free forever; you can browse our community-built charts here [4].

We'd love to get feedback from the HN community, hear your thoughts on what datasets we can add, and get advice on how we can make the querying experience even easier for those new to SQL.

[1]: https://factor.fyi/questions/dollar-cost-averaging-the-marke... [2]: https://factor.fyi/questions/s-p-btc-dia-correlation-factor-... [3]: https://factor.fyi/docs/dataset-reference [4]: https://factor.fyi/browse
description_zh-Hant:
嘿，HN,

我是Steve，Factor.fyi的聯合創始人，這是一個使用SQL查詢和可視化金融數據集的新數據平臺。在大流行期間，我在管理我的投資組合方面發揮了更大的積極作用。我希望能夠對我正在進行的投資做出明智的決定，並以新的方式探索金融數據。市場和經濟數據是一些最受關注和廣泛使用的數據集，但我對缺乏選擇來回答我的問題感到沮喪，比如，"如果我在2013年開始以美元成本平均化VTI，會發生什麼？"[1] 或者，"BTC和ETH有多少天與S&P500同向移動？我們建立Factor來回答這些問題。你可以用Factor來查詢不同的數據集，這在其他平臺上是不可能的。我們目前有20個數據集[3]，你可以用來回答你關於市場的問題，並圍繞它們創建漂亮的可視化。Factor is community-powered and free forever; you can browse our community-built charts here [4].

We'd love to get feedback from the HN community, hear your thoughts on what datasets we can add, and get advice on how we can make the querying experience even easier for those new to SQL.

[1]: https://factor.fyi/questions/dollar-cost-averaging-the-marke... [2]: https://factor.fyi/questions/s-p-btc-dia-correlation-factor-... [3]: https://factor.fyi/docs/dataset-reference [4]: https://factor.fyi/browse
